description.en: Quest Item: Recommendation from a Master to continue to your 2nd Job.
description.ar: Quest Item: Recommendation from a Master to continue to your 2nd Job.
description.br: (Quest) Recomendação de um Mestre para continuar para sua 2a Classe.
description.cns: 2转职业大师的推荐书。有了这个才能找贤者进行下一阶段的转职训练
description.de: (Questitem) Empfehlungsschreiben vom Meister der zweiten Jobklasse, die für den Wechsel der Jobklasse benötigt wird.
description.fi: Quest Item: Recommendation from a Master to continue to your 2nd Job.
description.fil: Quest Item: Recommendation from a Master to continue to your 2nd Job.
description.fr: La recommandation d'un Maître est nécessaire pour évoluer vers une classe avancée.
description.id: Item Quest: Rekomendasi dari Master untuk melanjutkan Job ke-2mu.
description.it: Quest Item: Recommendation from a Master to continue to your 2nd Job.
description.jp: 2次職業マスターの推薦書。この推薦書がないと、賢者から転職テストを行ってもらうことが出来ない。（クエストアイテム）
description.kr: 2차 직업마스터의 추천서. 이 추천서가 있어야만 현자로부터 전직 시험을 치를 수 있다.
description.nl: Quest Item: Recommendation from a Master to continue to your 2nd Job.
description.pl: Quest Item: Recommendation from a Master to continue to your 2nd Job.
description.ru: Ключевой предмет: рекомендация вашего мастера. В ней говорится, что вы готовы взяться за более узкое (и более сложное) амплуа.
description.sp: Objeto de Misión: Recomendación de un Maestro para continuar con tu 2da Clase.
description.sw: Quest Item: Recommendation from a Master to continue to your 2nd Job.
description.th: Quest Item: คำแนะนำจาก Master เพื่อทำงานที่ 2 ต่อไป
description.tw: [任務道具]2 轉職業大師的推薦書。有了這個才能找賢者進行下一階段的轉職訓練。
description.vi: Mục Nhiệm vụ: Đề xuất từ một Master để tiếp tục đến Công việc thứ 2 của bạn.
